detailed-description.heading: styling acessories that compliment your formal wear
detailed-description.about: Formal wear only serves as the base - itâ€™s the accessories you adorn that perfect the quintessential formal look. However, styling plays a massive role in the same. It should ideally have a little bit of everything to make your formal look a truly distinctive one. Here are a few tips on how you can style your formal wear
